messages.subject: Re: Thank you's
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/7/2004 9:46:01 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:  For kids who write pretty well and who really
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/7/2004 9:46:01 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
<< > For kids who write pretty well and who really like the person they're
> writing
> too, some of those objections would fall. >>

Maybe I needed more "too" or less "too" Maybe Tutu too.

Maybe if they really like the person they're writing to too, or to whom
they're writing also...

Ah never mind. Probably nobody noticed but me and a couple of people who
(like me) would be better off if they didn't have proofreader-brains.
*****************
Sandra, we ALL noticed. We just have a special list to discuss such things
amongst ourselves.
Kathryn
